value.title: Power BI query reduction when using DirectQuery
value.excerpt: Using DirectQuery in Power BI? Things slowing down and you want to make interactions snappier? Patrick looks how you can change a few settings to take the experience within Power BI to the next level!  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/
